import React,{useEffect,useState,useRef}from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import'./CursorFollower.css';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CursorFollower=()=>{const[mousePosition,setMousePosition]=useState({x:0,y:0});const[isHovering,setIsHovering]=useState(false);const[cursorType,setCursorType]=useState('default');const[isVisible,setIsVisible]=useState(false);const[particles,setParticles]=useState([]);const[isClicking,setIsClicking]=useState(false);const trailPositions=useRef([]);useEffect(()=>{const updateMousePosition=e=>{const newPos={x:e.clientX,y:e.clientY};setMousePosition(newPos);setIsVisible(true);// Update trail positions
trailPositions.current.unshift(newPos);if(trailPositions.current.length>8){trailPositions.current.pop();}// Generate particles on movement (occasionally)
if(Math.random()<0.3){generateParticle(newPos);}};const handleMouseDown=()=>{setIsClicking(true);// Generate burst of particles on click
for(let i=0;i<8;i++){setTimeout(()=>{generateParticle(mousePosition,true);},i*50);}};const handleMouseUp=()=>setIsClicking(false);const handleMouseOut=()=>setIsVisible(false);// Add event listeners
document.addEventListener('mousemove',updateMousePosition);document.addEventListener('mousedown',handleMouseDown);document.addEventListener('mouseup',handleMouseUp);document.addEventListener('mouseout',handleMouseOut);// Add hover listeners to different types of elements
const setupElementListeners=()=>{const buttonElements=document.querySelectorAll('button, .btn');const linkElements=document.querySelectorAll('a');const cardElements=document.querySelectorAll('.event-card, .category-card, .action-card');const inputElements=document.querySelectorAll('input, textarea, select');const handleElementEnter=type=>()=>{setIsHovering(true);setCursorType(type);};const handleElementLeave=()=>{setIsHovering(false);setCursorType('default');};buttonElements.forEach(el=>{el.addEventListener('mouseenter',handleElementEnter('button'));el.addEventListener('mouseleave',handleElementLeave);});linkElements.forEach(el=>{el.addEventListener('mouseenter',handleElementEnter('link'));el.addEventListener('mouseleave',handleElementLeave);});cardElements.forEach(el=>{el.addEventListener('mouseenter',handleElementEnter('card'));el.addEventListener('mouseleave',handleElementLeave);});inputElements.forEach(el=>{el.addEventListener('mouseenter',handleElementEnter('input'));el.addEventListener('mouseleave',handleElementLeave);});return()=>{[...buttonElements,...linkElements,...cardElements,...inputElements].forEach(el=>{el.removeEventListener('mouseenter',handleElementEnter);el.removeEventListener('mouseleave',handleElementLeave);});};};const cleanup=setupElementListeners();return()=>{document.removeEventListener('mousemove',updateMousePosition);document.removeEventListener('mousedown',handleMouseDown);document.removeEventListener('mouseup',handleMouseUp);document.removeEventListener('mouseout',handleMouseOut);cleanup();};},[mousePosition]);const setTimeout(()=>{setParticles(prev=>prev.filter(p=>p.id!==particle.id));},2000);};// Don't show on mobile/touch devices
